    Retrieve Gazetteer Records by Name

    mr_gaz_records_by_name.Rd

    Retrieve Gazetteer Records by Name

    Usage

    mr_gaz_records_by_name(
  name,
  count = 100,
  like = TRUE,
  fuzzy = FALSE,
  offset = 0
)

    Arguments

    name

    GazetteerName of the marine region of interest.

    count

    Number of records to retrieve.

    like

    Formats the name into a SQL-like syntax.

    fuzzy

    Uses Levenshtein query to find nearest matches.

    offset

    Start record number, in order to page through next batch of results.

    Value

    A tibble with Gazetter records.

    Examples

    mr_gaz_records_by_name(name = "High Seas", count = 5)
#> # A tibble: 5 × 14
#>   MRGID gazett…¹ place…² latit…³ longi…⁴ minLa…⁵ minLo…⁶ maxLa…⁷ maxLo…⁸ preci…⁹
